channel.title: Gamma Rays - Cheddr (Tropical House, Dance Mix)
channel.description:
https://soundcloud.com/cheddr/gamma-rays
Another song made while on a plane. Lots of melodic percussion. Sci-fi dance stuff.
Come say hi to me on twitter @CheddrMusic I’m having a lot of fun meeting other indie musicians outside the disco community and getting good exposure.
